## Overview

### Questions
1. How can I get help in R?


 
### Answers

1. In the RStudio Console Window by typing ?name_of_function or help(function_name) like this ?stats

1. In class 
   * the chat will be monitored for questions and answered by co-instructors or helpers during the class
   * 
   
1. Official R Help
   * Help -> R Help includes resources on R and RStudio, Manuals such as "An Introduction to R". 
  
   * Help -> Cheatsheets -> select a cheatsheet or browse
    
    

* Objectives
    * To be able read R help files for functions and special operators.
    * To be able to use CRAN task views to identify packages to solve a problem.
    * To be able to seek help from your peers.
